Class Weapon

  • java.lang.Object
    • game.engine.Weapon

  • public class Weapon
extends java.lang.Object
    Created by flavia on 02.03.17.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Weapon(Weapon weaponPrototype)
      This creates a new Instance of a Weapon with the values copied from the given prototype from weaponPrototypes.
